Package com.prms.controller

Class HomeController

java.lang.Object
com.prms.controller.HomeController
@Controller public class HomeController extends Object
The HomeController class is a Spring MVC controller responsible for handling various requests related to the home page, user login, admin login, doctor login, user registration, and other related functionalities. It provides methods for handling these requests and interacting with the corresponding services and repositories. This class serves as the main entry point for the application and manages the navigation between different views. The class also utilizes the AdminRepository, DoctorService, and PasswordEncoder components for specific operations. It uses the AdminHelper class to store and retrieve user information during the session. Additionally, it relies on the Message class for displaying error/success messages to the user. This class is responsible for managing the routing and control flow of the application's home and authentication-related pages. It handles the authentication process for admin and doctor users, as well as provides the necessary functionality for user registration. The class also handles requests related to displaying developer information and managing the user's session.
Since:
05/05/2023

    • adminLogin

      @GetMapping("/adminLogin") public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView adminLogin()
      Handles the GET request for the admin login page.
      Returns:
      The ModelAndView object containing the logical view name of the admin login page and an empty Admin object.

    • adminLoginProcess

      @PostMapping("/adminLog") public String adminLoginProcess(@RequestParam("username") String email, @RequestParam("password") String password, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Handles the POST request for the admin login process.
      Parameters:
      email - The email address provided by the admin during login.
      password - The password provided by the admin during login.
      model - The Model object used to pass data to the view.
      Returns:
      If the login is successful, it redirects to the admin index page. If the login fails, it redirects back to the admin login page with an error message.

      password - The password provided by the doctor during login.

      Returns:

    • adminSignUP

      @PostMapping("/do_register") public String adminSignUP(@RequestParam("fullname") String fullname, @RequestParam("email") String email, @RequestParam("password") String password, org.springframework.ui.Model model, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Handles the POST request for admin signup.
      Parameters:
      fullname - The full name of the admin.
      email - The email address of the admin.
      password - The password of the admin.
      model - The Model object used to pass data to the view.
      session - The HttpSession object used to manage the session attributes.
      Returns:
      The logical view name of the admin login page.
